name: PasteImageIntoImage
description: Paste the input image into the input canvas image. Depending on parameters, it can replace or merge existing voxel values.

inputs.name: Image dimension
inputs.description: Specify the dimension of the images.

inputs.name: Input canvas image
inputs.description: The canvas image on which the input image will be pasted.

inputs.name: Input image
inputs.description: The image to be pasted onto the canvas.

inputs.name: Start index
inputs.description: The starting index where the input image will be pasted on the canvas.

inputs.name: Background label
inputs.description: The label value considered as background.

inputs.name: Paint over non-background voxels
inputs.description: Defines behavior when the input image voxel is non-background and the corresponding canvas voxel is background: 0 - leave as is, 1 - replace with input voxel value, 2 - replace with conflict label.

inputs.name: Conflict label
inputs.description: The label value used for conflicting non-background voxels if 'paintOverNonBackgroundVoxels' is set to 2.

output-files.name: Output image file
output-files.description: The final output image with the input image pasted onto the canvas.

author: ANTs developers
